name: Diamond Duston
text: When a card(s) on the field is destroyed by battle or card effect: Special Summon "Duston" monsters from your Deck to anywhere on the field, equal to the number of cards destroyed. Once, while this card is in your Graveyard: You can banish 1 "Duston" monster from your Graveyard; Special Summon this card to your opponent's field in Defense Position as a Normal Monster (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 1000). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap Card.) If Summoned this way, this card cannot be Tributed or be used as Fusion, Synchro, or Xyz Material for a Summon.
